About the Company: Cubex Tubings Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing of seamless tubes, rods, strips and wires.The company has clients from various sectors such as chemicals and fertilizers, petrochemicals and oil refineries, electronics and telecommunication, ship building and automotive transport, power generation and energy distribution, atomic energy, space research and defence, machine building and general engineering and electrical industries. The company`s products range includes: Copper-Company manufactures various types of copper such as DHP Copper, ETP Copper, OFHC Copper and Silver Bearing Copper. Brass- Under this company manufactures alloy range such as admirality brass, aluminium brass and other compositions and Cupronickel.
